title: Typographical clothing
content:
These are things I made because I wanted them for myself, but they are also available to purchase.  
 [http://www.redbubble.com/people/tirotypeworks/collections/239888-typogra...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414232108/http:/www.redbubble.com/people/tirotypeworks/collections/239888-typographical-clothing "http://www.redbubble.com/people/tirotypeworks/collections/239888-typographical-clothing")

Two designs currently available:  
1. 'My parents went to Yxnerum...'  
2. Sanskrit pangram (still working on a translation)

I'll update this thread if new designs are added.
author: John Hudson

comments.content: And you are not modelling the designs yourself because...
Hey John, what happened to the page? I was curious about the Sanskrit shirt.
